description: This dataset contains information about German companies including attributes such as Company, Period, Revenue, Net Income, Liabilities, Assets, Equity, ROA (%), ROE (%), Debt to Equity, and percentage Debt to Equity.
attrs_desc:
- Company [string]: the name of the company.
- Period [string]: the period for the financial data.
- Revenue [numeric]: the revenue generated by the company.
- Net Income [numeric]: the net income of the company.
- Liabilities [numeric]: the liabilities of the company.
- Assets [numeric]: the total assets of the company.
- Equity [numeric]: the equity of the company.
- ROA (%) [string]: the Return on Assets percentage.
- ROE (%) [string]: the Return on Equity percentage.
- Debt to Equity [string]: the ratio of debt to equity.
- percentage Debt to Equity [string]: the percentage of debt to equity ratio.

description: This dataset contains information about employees' productivity and satisfaction in a company. It includes attributes such as Name, Age, Gender, Projects Completed, Productivity (%), Satisfaction Rate (%), Feedback Score, Department, Position, Joining Date, and Salary.
attrs_desc:
- Name [string]: the name of the employee
- Age [integer]: the age of the employee
- Gender [string]: the gender of the employee
- Projects Completed [integer]: the number of projects completed by the employee
- Productivity (%) [integer]: the productivity percentage of the employee
- Satisfaction Rate (%) [integer]: the satisfaction rate percentage of the employee
- Feedback Score [float]: the feedback score of the employee
- Department [string]: the department in which the employee works
- Position [string]: the position of the employee
- Joining Date [string]: the date when the employee joined the company
- Salary [integer]: the salary of the employee

description: This dataset contains information about employees in a company, including attributes such as satisfaction level, last evaluation score, number of projects, average monthly hours worked, years spent in the company, work accident status, employment status, promotion status in the last 5 years, department, and salary level.
attrs_desc:
- satisfaction_level [numerical]: represents the level of satisfaction of the employees.
- last_evaluation [numerical]: indicates the last performance evaluation score of the employees.
- number_project [numerical]: shows the number of projects the employees have worked on.
- average_montly_hours [numerical]: displays the average number of monthly hours worked by the employees.
- time_spend_company [numerical]: indicates the number of years the employees have spent in the company.
- Work_accident [categorical]: represents whether the employee has had a work accident or not.
- left [categorical]: indicates whether the employee has left the company or not.
- promotion_last_5years [categorical]: shows whether the employee has received a promotion in the last 5 years.
- sales [categorical]: represents the department in which the employee works.
- salary [categorical]: indicates the salary level of the employees.

description: The dataset contains information about passengers on the Titanic, including details such as PassengerId, Pclass, Name, Sex, Age, SibSp, Parch, Ticket, Fare, Cabin, and Embarked.
attrs_desc:
- PassengerId [int]: The unique identifier for each passenger.
- Pclass [int]: The class of the passenger (1st, 2nd, or 3rd class).
- Name [str]: The name of the passenger.
- Sex [str]: The gender of the passenger.
- Age [float]: The age of the passenger.
- SibSp [int]: The number of siblings/spouses aboard.
- Parch [int]: The number of parents/children aboard.
- Ticket [str]: The ticket number of the passenger.
- Fare [float]: The fare paid by the passenger.
- Cabin [str]: The cabin number of the passenger.
- Embarked [str]: The port of embarkation (C = Cherbourg, Q = Queenstown, S = Southampton).
